We currently do not have a rating system regarding selection and utilization of consultants, as the City of Worthing as only just recently implemented the City Administrator form of government.  There have been many policies and procedures put into effect for the first time.

author: Angel Smith
text:
I am looking for sample policies regarding selection and utilization of consultants.
1). What system does your municipality have in place for rating consultants? 
2). Does every department use a similar system?
title: Selection and utilization of consultants
